pkgmetadata.longdescription: # rut-chilePython module that provides common functionality regarding Chilean RUT[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/gevalenz/rut-chile.svg?token=K7zbkgBiGA3AKhLgGz8a&branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/gevalenz/rut-chile)# Installation``` pip install rut_chile```or```git clone https://github.com/gevalenz/rut-chile.gitpython setup.py install```# Usage## Validate RUT```from rut_chile import rut_chilerut_chile.is_valid_rut("12345678-9")# returns Falserut_chile.is_valid_rut("6265837-1")# returns True# It works with the following formatsrut_chile.is_valid_rut("98685030")# returns Truerut_chile.is_valid_rut("9868503-0")# returns Truerut_chile.is_valid_rut("9.868.503-0")# returns Truerut_chile.is_valid_rut("12.667.869-K")# returns Truerut_chile.is_valid_rut("12.667.869-k")# returns True```## Get verification digit```from rut_chile import rut_chilerut_chile.get_verification_digit("9868503")# returns "0"rut_chile.get_verification_digit("12667869")# returns "k"rut_chile.get_capitalized_verification_digit("12667869")# returns "K"```## Format RUT```from rut_chile import rut_chilerut_chile.format_rut_with_dots("12667869k")# returns "12.667.869-k"rut_chile.format_rut_without_dots("12667869k")# returns "12667869-k"rut_chile.format_capitalized_rut_without_dots("12667869k")# returns "12667869-K"rut_chile.format_capitalized_rut_with_dots("12667869k")# returns "12.667.869-K"```
